Mohan me seems is that school go be and

Mira bazaar go.pf.f be

tier.item: b. Kali mujhe lagtaa hai ki jo kitaab tum ti
yesterday me seems is that book you
REL
maamNg rahe the vo picle itvaarKO Mohan maaNg
ask prog.pl be dem last Sunday Mohan ask
rahe the
prog.3p be.Pst.pl

was asking for last Sunday.'
